text: 14:7 Dɨboboniba 13:1-30Dughiar kamɨn kɨ 40plan azeniba itima, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ingangarir gumazim Moses, a na amaga ghaze, nɨ Kades Barnea ategh mangɨ nguazir ekiar kam mogomemɨn, a getiva an ganigh. Ezɨ kɨ ghua uan damazimɨn ganizir biziba, kɨ uamategha iza guizbangɨra bar uan navim sara Moses geghani.
